Class Person

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.omo.sem.actors.Being
cz.cvut.fel.omo.sem.actors.people.Person
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventObserver, Updatable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Baby, Father, Child, Mother, Teenager
public abstract class Person extends Being implements EventObserver
Abstract class representing a person in the simulation.
